result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason Thomas Tucker

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:09 a.m. Court calls cases, cites appearances. Def appears in person.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Court reviews cases.  Def indicates was making too much for PD prior but income has now changed.  Court advises def to contact PD again.  If doesn't qualify, can try for court-appointed atty.  Case to be rescheduled.  Def provides new address to Court of 139 S. Curry St., Ironwood.  Court reviews def's bonds in both cases.  22CT20 to be converted to $500 cash and def to sign before being released.  Def has already posted at ICSD.  Def needs to sign bond before leaving today.  11/7 at 9:00 a.m. for AIA.  Court advises def to contact PD before next hearing. Adj. 9:13 a.m.  klr

ADDRESS INFO for Jason Thomas Tucker
Current: 317 E. Oak, Ironwood, MI 49938-3350   (Effective: 07-11-2022)
Prior: 312 E Bundy St, Ironwood, MI 49938-3350

11:34 a.m.  BBH:  Def lodged on warrant.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Def is aware of the charges.  Copy of complaint provided to def.  Court explains right to atty.  Reads charges and penalties.  Def waives reading of complaint.  Def understands.  Intends to get atty.  Initial to be posted on 7/25 at 9:00 a.m.  Def posted $200.  DA requests no driving without valid DL and $200 cash.  Court sets $200 cash bond, def not to operate without DL.  317 E. Oak St, Ironwood, provided as new address.  7/25 is initial app date on new case (not filed.)  Adj.  11:39 a.m. klr
Def shall not operate a motor vehicle without a valid license.

10:19 AM Defendant Jason Thomas Tucker not in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case.  Def FTA.  DA requests warrant be authorized.  Court authorizes with $500 cash release/appear Monday following arrest.  Adj.  10:20 a.m.  klr
